ygData.subject: So which RW server are we going to?
ygData.msgSnippet: TZ or VZ? Confirm leh, if not half go TZ half go VZ then have to start all over leh Anyway, I think I will play a Halfling Druid. My brother wants to play a DE
ygData.messageBody:
TZ or VZ?
Confirm leh, if not half go TZ half go VZ then have to start all over leh
Anyway, I think I will play a Halfling Druid. My brother wants to play a DE
Necro. So he can join the evil guild you guys are forming.
If you see me don't kill me hor, at most I cast SoW on you guys when I see
you all lah ok?
But the real question is, TZ or VZ? Can someone comfirm? Or must sit and
wait to see which is less crowded? I don't think it matters, since we will
be playing during off-peak hours anyway. Maybe except for weekends, but I
estimate should have the same number of players playing as before, maybe an
extra of 100(off-peak) to 1000(peak)(Duh). But I still want to confirm, if
not some of us end up having to change server.
